item.title: K3S Install
item.description: Master / Control In our case: control01 This is our primary node. We are going to install the K3s version of Kubernetes, that is lightweight enough for out single board computers to handle. Use the following command to download and initialize K3s’ master node. curl -sfL https://get.k3s.io | sh -s - --write-kubeconfig-mode 644 --disable servicelb --token some_random_password --node-taint CriticalAddonsOnly=true:NoExecute --bind-address 192.168.0.10 --disable-cloud-controller --disable local-storage Some explanations: –write-kubeconfig-mode 644 - This is the mode that we want to use for the kubeconfig file.
